enum.name: CREATE
enum.description: Permission to create entities within a container entity

enum.name: CHANGE_PERMISSIONS
enum.description: Permission to modify the access control list

enum.name: DOWNLOAD
enum.description: Permission to download file(s) associated with entities

enum.name: UPLOAD
enum.description: Permission to upload files to a container entity (project or folder)

enum.name: CREATE_PRIVATE
enum.description: Permission to create entities with a container entity having their own access control list.

enum.name: PARTICIPATE
enum.description: Permission to join a team, as controlled by an Access Requirement on the team

enum.name: SUBMIT
enum.description: Permission to submit to an evalution queue

enum.name: READ_PRIVATE_SUBMISSION
enum.description: Permission to read private submission metadata and download the associate files

enum.name: UPDATE_SUBMISSION
enum.description: Permission to modify a submission annotations

enum.name: TEAM_MEMBERSHIP_UPDATE
enum.description: Permission to modify the membership of a team

enum.name: SEND_MESSAGE
enum.description: Permission to send messages to a team

enum.name: CHANGE_SETTINGS
enum.description: Permission to set a friendly URL for a project

enum.name: MODERATE
enum.description: Permission to moderate a discussion forum
